parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To play the flute, pipe. From aulos; to play the flute.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To dance. Middle voice from orchos; to dance.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: Intrans: I lament, wail; trans: I bewail. From threnos; to bewail.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; to 'chop'; specially, to beat the breast in grief.
